text: super quick video for the ape outliers out there too fun not to share so at 09 we have roaring Kitty dropping Woody with obviously the dog stock that's what this clearly represents not so cryptic in this sense back into the toy box and so what do we know well we know probably that he's closing if not exited the entire chewy position and then the other interesting thing is that if we take a look at what's happened today in the options Market I can show you that there is 1.12 million dollars that went into the 13 sep 22 and a half calls who knows who it is I don't but I do know some people that tend to move in this kind of size around this position and then if you take one look below that at uh 842 we see another 61900 same strike same expiration so to me it looks like there's a little bit of a shift going on and right now the phone is freaking out cuz I have a bunch of Trades that are uh moving around as they should be because if we take a look at gam stop uh GameStop is now up over 6 already and we're leading into earnings this is exactly what I've been talking about with respect to as soon as there's a catalyst the stock starts to move and right now it looks like the catalyst is very much likely to be the cat
